content: *note this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free version on my blog www theturtletrunk com* these pumpkins feature a beautiful and unique texture taking them up a notch from your standard crochet pumpkin they are perfect for fall decor selling in markets or giving as gifts use a medium grey pumpkin bulky orange pumpkin or super bulky white pumpkin weight yarn to achieve different sizes or adjust the width and height of the pattern to make your pumpkins larger or smaller the pattern is beginner friendly and very versatile difficulty easy supplies needed ● yarn medium 4 bulky 5 or super bulky 6 ● hook 4mm g 6mm j or 7mm ● fiber fill ● yarn needle ● scissors ● pumpkin stem 2-3 stick cinnamon stick leather strip ect pattern includes ● detailed written instruction ● link to video tutorial ● reference photos ● gauge
